Text: E-Edition Sign up for email newsletters  Sign up for email newsletters E-Edition Send information for this listing 10 days in advance of publication to: Club News, Lifestyle Department, The Sun, 491 Dutton St., Lowell, MA 01854. Listings will run as often as space permits. NARFE: Chapter 360, National Active and Retired Employees, will hold its next meeting on Monday, March 7, 1:30 p.m., at the Matthews Memorial Church Hall, 128 Gorham St., East Chelmsford. Guest Speaker is Ms. Michele Ellicks, Outreach Community Coordinator for the Massachusetts Registry of Motor Vehicles, with the topic titled “Shifting Gears.” BILLERICA GARDEN CLUB: Meets first Tues. each month at Cabot Corporation. Email President Linda Haley at jlhaley3a@verizon.net for information. CLUB RICHELIEU: A Lowell-based international service club that preserves the French language. Meets first Wed. each month (except June-Aug.), 6:30 p.m. at various restaurants. Call 978-970-1107. DRACUT GARDEN CLUB: Meets first Wed. each month, 7-9 p.m., (March-Dec.) at Harmony Hall, Lakeview Ave., Dracut. New members welcome. For more information, call Mary Jo at 978-454-9733 or Donna at 978-937-7078 or leave a message on Facebook. GENTLEMEN SONGSTERS BARBERSHOP HARMONY CHAPTER: Meets each Tues., 7:30 p.m. at All Saints Episcopal Church, 10 Billerica Road, Chelmsford. Visit gentlemensongsters.org, call 978-267-1644, or email gentlemensongsters@gmail.com. INDEPENDENT FILM NIGHT: Meets second Thurs. each month (March 10, Secrets of War), 6:30 p.m., at Pollard Memorial Library, 401 Merrimack St., Lowell. Visit pollardml.org. KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS, COUNCIL 72: Meets first and third Wed. of month, 8 p.m., Holy Trinity Parish Center, High St., Lowell. Call 978-452-1731. KNIGHTS OF COLUMBUS, DRACUT COUNCIL 4225: Meets first Tues. each month, 7 p.m., at Dracut Historical Society, Lakeview Ave. Call 978-458-2667 or ed_gertz@msn.com. LAKE MASCUPPIC ASSOCIATION: Meets first Wed. of each month, 7 p.m., Multi-Service Center, Lakeview Avenue, Tyngsboro. Call 978-957-0518. MERRIMACK VALLEY PLAYWRIGHTS: Meets first Wed. each month at The Space, Lowell, to hear and give feedback on staged readings of members’ scripts. New members welcome. Visit sites.google.com/site/mvplaywrights/home or contact andrew@cottage14.com. NABNASSET AMERICAN LEGION AUXILIARY UNIT 437: Meets first Mon. each month, 6:30 p.m., at the Post Quarters, 114 Dunstable Road, Westford. New members welcome. Applications available at the post. NASHOBA VALLEY PHOTO CLUB: Meets first and third Wed. each month, 7:30 p.m. at J.V. Fletcher Library, Westford. Open to all photo enthusiasts. Visit westford.com/nvpc. PAWS & CLAWS: A 4H club that focuses on all things cat — formed out of members’ desire to get their cats used to travel and being around other cats at 4H Fair in Westford. Club meets first Wed. each month in Billerica to focus on growing the cat department at the fair, community service (helping area shelters, cat therapy at nursing homes), learning about cats and making entries to the 4H Fair. To find out more, contact Tracey Mackersie at 978-486-3549. Copyright 2026 Lowell Sun. All rights reserved.
